verses.verse: The word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> also came unto me, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, thou dwellest <S%H3427><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of a rebellious <S%H4805><s%> house <S%H1004><s%>, which have eyes <S%H5869><s%> to see <S%H7200><s%>, and see <S%H7200><s%> not; they have ears <S%H241><s%> to hear <S%H8085><s%>, and hear <S%H8085><s%> not: for they are a rebellious <S%H4805><s%> house <S%H1004><s%>.

Therefore, thou son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, prepare <S%H6213><s%> thee stuff <S%H3627><s%> for removing <S%H1473><s%>, and remove <S%H1540><s%> by day <S%H3119><s%> in their sight <S%H5869><s%>; and thou shalt remove <S%H1540><s%> from thy place <S%H4725><s%> to another <S%H312><s%> place <S%H4725><s%> in their sight <S%H5869><s%>: it may be they will consider <S%H7200><s%>, though they be a rebellious <S%H4805><s%> house <S%H1004><s%>. stuff: or, instruments

Then shalt thou bring forth <S%H3318><s%> thy stuff <S%H3627><s%> by day <S%H3119><s%> in their sight <S%H5869><s%>, as stuff <S%H3627><s%> for removing <S%H1473><s%>: and thou shalt go forth <S%H3318><s%> at even <S%H6153><s%> in their sight <S%H5869><s%>, as they that go forth <S%H4161><s%> into captivity <S%H1473><s%>. as they: Heb. as the goings forth of captivity
Dig <S%H2864><s%> thou through the wall <S%H7023><s%> in their sight <S%H5869><s%>, and carry out <S%H3318><s%> thereby. Dig: Heb. Dig for thee

In their sight <S%H5869><s%> shalt thou bear <S%H5375><s%> it upon thy shoulders <S%H3802><s%>, and carry it forth <S%H3318><s%> in the twilight <S%H5939><s%>: thou shalt cover <S%H3680><s%> thy face <S%H6440><s%>, that thou see <S%H7200><s%> not the ground <S%H776><s%>: for I have set <S%H5414><s%> thee for a sign <S%H4159><s%> unto the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

And I did <S%H6213><s%> so as I was commanded <S%H6680><s%>: I brought forth <S%H3318><s%> my stuff <S%H3627><s%> by day <S%H3119><s%>, as stuff <S%H3627><s%> for captivity <S%H1473><s%>, and in the even <S%H6153><s%> I digged <S%H2864><s%> through the wall <S%H7023><s%> with mine hand <S%H3027><s%>; I brought it forth <S%H3318><s%> in the twilight <S%H5939><s%>, and I bare <S%H5375><s%> it upon my shoulder <S%H3802><s%> in their sight <S%H5869><s%>. digged: Heb. digged for me
And in the morning <S%H1242><s%> came the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> unto me, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, hath not the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, the rebellious <S%H4805><s%> house <S%H1004><s%>, said <S%H559><s%> unto thee, What doest <S%H6213><s%> thou?

Say <S%H559><s%> thou unto them, Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>; This burden <S%H4853><s%> concerneth the prince <S%H5387><s%> in Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>, and all the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> that are among <S%H8432><s%> them.

Say <S%H559><s%>, I am your sign <S%H4159><s%>: like as I have done <S%H6213><s%>, so shall it be done <S%H6213><s%> unto them: they shall remove <S%H1473><s%> and go <S%H3212><s%> into captivity <S%H7628><s%>. they: Heb. by removing go into captivity

And the prince <S%H5387><s%> that is among <S%H8432><s%> them shall bear <S%H5375><s%> upon his shoulder <S%H3802><s%> in the twilight <S%H5939><s%>, and shall go forth <S%H3318><s%>: they shall dig <S%H2864><s%> through the wall <S%H7023><s%> to carry out <S%H3318><s%> thereby: he shall cover <S%H3680><s%> his face <S%H6440><s%>, that <S%H3282><s%> he see <S%H7200><s%> not the ground <S%H776><s%> with his eyes <S%H5869><s%>.

My net <S%H7568><s%> also will I spread <S%H6566><s%> upon him, and he shall be taken <S%H8610><s%> in my snare <S%H4686><s%>: and I will bring <S%H935><s%> him to Babylon <S%H894><s%> to the land <S%H776><s%> of the Chaldeans <S%H3778><s%>; yet shall he not see <S%H7200><s%> it, though he shall die <S%H4191><s%> there.

And I will scatter <S%H2219><s%> toward every wind <S%H7307><s%> all that are about <S%H5439><s%> him to help <S%H5828><s%> him, and all his bands <S%H102><s%>; and I will draw out <S%H7324><s%> the sword <S%H2719><s%> after <S%H310><s%> them.

And they shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, when I shall scatter <S%H6327><s%> them among the nations <S%H1471><s%>, and disperse <S%H2219><s%> them in the countries <S%H776><s%>.

But I will leave <S%H3498><s%> a few <S%H4557><s%> men <S%H582><s%> of them from the sword <S%H2719><s%>, from the famine <S%H7458><s%>, and from the pestilence <S%H1698><s%>; that they may declare <S%H5608><s%> all their abominations <S%H8441><s%> among the heathen <S%H1471><s%> whither they come <S%H935><s%>; and they shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the LORD <S%H3068><s%>. a few: Heb. men of number
Moreover the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came to me, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, eat <S%H398><s%> thy bread <S%H3899><s%> with quaking <S%H7494><s%>, and drink <S%H8354><s%> thy water <S%H4325><s%> with trembling <S%H7269><s%> and with carefulness <S%H1674><s%>;

And say <S%H559><s%> unto the people <S%H5971><s%> of the land <S%H127><s%>, Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%> of the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>, and of the land <S%H776><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>; They shall eat <S%H398><s%> their bread <S%H3899><s%> with carefulness <S%H1674><s%>, and drink <S%H8354><s%> their water <S%H4325><s%> with astonishment <S%H8078><s%>, that her land <S%H776><s%> may be desolate <S%H3456><s%> from all that is therein <S%H4393><s%>, because of the violence <S%H2555><s%> of all them that dwell <S%H3427><s%> therein. all that: Heb. the fulness thereof

And the cities <S%H5892><s%> that are inhabited <S%H3427><s%> shall be laid waste <S%H2717><s%>, and the land <S%H776><s%> shall be desolate <S%H8077><s%>; and ye shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.
And the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came unto me, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, what is that proverb <S%H4912><s%> that ye have in the land <S%H127><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, The days <S%H3117><s%> are prolonged <S%H748><s%>, and every vision <S%H2377><s%> faileth <S%H6><s%>?

Tell <S%H559><s%> them therefore, Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>; I will make this proverb <S%H4912><s%> to cease <S%H7673><s%>, and they shall no more use it as a proverb <S%H4911><s%> in Israel <S%H3478><s%>; but say <S%H1696><s%> unto them, The days <S%H3117><s%> are at hand <S%H7126><s%>, and the effect <S%H1697><s%> of every vision <S%H2377><s%>.
For there shall be no more any vain <S%H7723><s%> vision <S%H2377><s%> nor flattering <S%H2509><s%> divination <S%H4738><s%> within <S%H8432><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

For I am the LORD <S%H3068><s%>: I will speak <S%H1696><s%>, and the word <S%H1697><s%> that I shall speak <S%H1696><s%> shall come to pass <S%H6213><s%>; it shall be no more prolonged <S%H4900><s%>: for in your days <S%H3117><s%>, O rebellious <S%H4805><s%> house <S%H1004><s%>, will I say <S%H1696><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%>, and will perform <S%H6213><s%> it, saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>.
Again the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came to me, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, behold, they of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> say <S%H559><s%>, The vision <S%H2377><s%> that he seeth <S%H2372><s%> is for many <S%H7227><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> to come, and he prophesieth <S%H5012><s%> of the times <S%H6256><s%> that are far <S%H7350><s%> off.

Therefore say <S%H559><s%> unto them, Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>; There shall none of my words <S%H1697><s%> be prolonged <S%H4900><s%> any more, but the word <S%H1697><s%> which I have spoken <S%H1696><s%> shall be done <S%H6213><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>.
